item.title: principles for deep work
item.description: Block out any distractions turn off all phone notifications or leave it in another room Distraction is the biggest enemy to deep focus Go for a walk before starting Go out in nature Explore somewhere new Plan it out the night before Set your main 3 priorities Write them down and forget until morning

item.title: tips for time management
item.description: backgroud Time > Money. tips 1. The 2-Minute Rule If it takes less than 2 minutes, do it now, Yes, even if it’s getting up to stretch Procrastination is for stretching, not tasks! 2. The 5-Minute Rule try it more than 5 minutes even the task is hard. 3. Eat the Frog First Tackle the hardest task first thing in the morning, Frogs taste better when you’re notthinking about them
